item.description:
Massachusetts Poetry Festival -- October 10 - 12

Lowell, MA

We won't be going in a group, but feel free to stop by the festival any time on Saturday and stroll around; you are likely to run into other Boston Poetry Union members. Our own Pen & Anvil Press will be sharing a booth with Fulcrum, and we will have several publications available.


The Massachusetts Poetry Festival is a three-day celebration of the poets, poetry, and literary heritage of a state whose contribution to American poetry is unsurpassed in the nation. The downtown sidewalks, restaurants, auditoriums, meeting rooms, and parks of Lowell will feature poetry, workshops, readings, programs for children and young writers, literary tours, films, and music.



Featured readers include Marjorie Agosin, Lucie Brock-Broido, Martin Espada, Rhina Espaillat, Nick Flynn, Regie Gibson, Robert Pinsky, and Ed Sanders.



For full details, see www.masspoetry.org/festival
